summary: Recycling into logistics: AP industries remain resilient, reaching USD 6.7 trillion in Q1 2023, marking a 4.0% increase and USD 3.0 trillion in volume. Basish outlook toward office continued, signaling investors to pivot toward logistics; some investors have already started or are planning to mitigate capital allocation into logistics. The sector is being greater risking risk especially in 5G, AGS and SK, greater exposure than office means more volatility in the time, whilst higher cost of debt than office acts a detriment in the latter.
